ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table

Class Join

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table.Join
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableTransformation

    public class Join
extends Object
implements TableTransformation
    Joins multiple tables on the values of specific columns. This table performs roughly what the "join" operator does in relational algebra.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

      protected String[] m_commonDimensions
